      • encrypt

        public static long encrypt(javax.crypto.Cipher cipher,
                           java.security.Key key,
                           java.io.InputStream in,
                           java.io.OutputStream out,
                           int blockSize,
                           @Nullable
                           @Nullable AlgorithmParams params)
        Encrypts data from given input stream into given output stream with specified cipher, returns the written bytes count. If blockSize > 0, this method will submit the data in blocks of the specified size to the cipher for encryption, otherwise, it will submit all the data to the cipher at once.
        Parameters:
        cipher - specified cipher
        key - key for encrypting
        in - given input stream
        out - given output stream
        blockSize - block size for each encrypting
        params - algorithm parameters
        Returns:
        written bytes count

If blockSize > 0, this method will submit the data in blocks of the specified size to the cipher for encryption, otherwise, it will submit all the data to the cipher at once.
        Parameters:

        key - key for encrypting
        in - given input stream
        out - given output stream
        blockSize - block size for each decrypting
        params - algorithm parameters

      • doEncrypt

        public static long doEncrypt(javax.crypto.Cipher cipher,
                             int mode,
                             java.security.Key key,
                             java.io.InputStream in,
                             java.io.OutputStream out,
                             int blockSize,
                             @Nullable
                             @Nullable AlgorithmParams params)
        Encrypts/Decrypts data from given input stream into given output stream with specified cipher, returns the written bytes count. If blockSize > 0, this method will submit the data in blocks of the specified size to the cipher for encryption, otherwise, it will submit all the data to the cipher at once.
        Parameters:
        cipher - specified cipher
        mode - encryption mode: (Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE/Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE)
        key - key for encrypting
        in - given input stream
        out - given output stream
        blockSize - block size for each decrypting
        params - algorithm parameters
        Returns:
        written bytes count
